SET NOCOUNT ON /*******************************************/ /* 메모테이블 - T_MEMO 저장 - SAVE QUERY */ /*******************************************/ DECLARE @IDX BIGINT = N'{0}' , @TABLE_NAME VARCHAR(30) = N'{1}' , @TABLE_KEY VARCHAR(20) = N'{2}' , @MEMO NVARCHAR(400) = N'{3}' , @MEMO1 NVARCHAR(400) = N'{4}' , @MEMO2 NVARCHAR(400) = N'{5}' , @INSERT_CODE INT = {6} , @INSERT_DATE DATETIME = GETDATE()
UPDATE A SET TABLE_NAME = @TABLE_NAME ,TABLE_KEY = @TABLE_KEY , MEMO = @MEMO ,MEMO1 = @MEMO1 , MEMO2 = @MEMO2
FROM T_MEMO A WHERE IDX= @IDX IF @@ROWCOUNT = 0 BEGIN INSERT INTO T_MEMO ( TABLE_NAME , TABLE_KEY , MEMO , MEMO1 , MEMO2 , INSERT_CODE , INSERT_DATE
) SELECT @TABLE_NAME , @TABLE_KEY , @MEMO , @MEMO1 , @MEMO2 , @INSERT_CODE , @INSERT_DATE SET @IDX = IDENT_CURRENT('T_MEMO') END SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(100), @IDX) AS DATA SET NOCOUNT OFF

SET NOCOUNT ON /******************************************/ /* 메모정보 - T_MEMO 삭제 - Delete QUERY */ /******************************************/ DECLARE @IDX INT = N'{2}'
DELETE A FROM T_MEMO A WHERE 1=1 AND IDX= @IDX
SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(100), @IDX) AS DATA
SET NOCOUNT OFF
